text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: ――Well then, shall we begin? Everyone, all together――

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Congrats on the fan letter, Machitan!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no, thank you, thank you. Hehehe...
To commemorate Matikanetannhauser receiving a fan letter, a party was being held today with friends gathered.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Now, Tannhauser-san. Please share your current feelings.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah~ I've been feeling giddy since getting the letter. Of course, I always carry it with me, and I even kept it by my pillow at night~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You know, to me, this fan letter is like a new family member.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Family, huh~! Then we gotta give it a name!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: No, no, that's just a figure of speech... Surely not a name too――

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The name is 'Letter-kun'!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You already named it!?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Now, Tannhauser-san, please announce the contents with great anticipation.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Leave it to me! I've read it over and over again, so my recitation is perfect!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: 'Hello, Matikanetannhauser-san. I always watch your races.'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...'I've always been ordinary at everything, and I tend to give up easily. But seeing you run brought a change.'...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: 'Facing any opponent, any race, giving it your all and putting everything you have into it. I was deeply moved by that sight'――

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Sniff...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Huh? Are you okay? Tannhauser?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mm~mm, I'm fine, I'm fine. Okay, let's continue.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ――'From now on, please keep doing your best energetically and powerfully.' Yep, yep. I'll do my best.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: 'Matikanetannhauser-san is a special hero to me'...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ——Bwaaahhhh～～!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You're gonna cry after all! Haven't you read it many times?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: W-well, yeah, but... I just got so emotional...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm touched that I can be someone special to someone else, too, and I just...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: S-sniffle! From now on, I'll... work super duper hard! ...I think I'll write that in my reply!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Ooh～!
And so, Matikanetannhauser, having received courage from her fans, renewed her determination to keep striving.
